required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Determine Pharmacokinetic Characteristics of LY03010 Versus INVEGA SUSTENNA® in Schizophrenia Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Single-Dose, Open-Label, Parallel-Group Study to Determine the Relative Pharmacokinetic Characteristics of LY03010 Versus INVEGA SUSTENNA® in Schizophrenia Patients

brief_summary.textblock: This study will look at the Characteristics of LY03010 Versus INVEGA SUSTENNA® in the blood of Schizophrenia Patients

primary_outcome.time_frame: Time Zero to Last quantifiable concentration (120 days)

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety Assessments as measured by Adverse Events that occur during the study
secondary_outcome.description: Safety Assessments as measured by Adverse Events that occur during the study

intervention.description: Single Dose of LY03010 at 351 mg or 156 mg or 117mg

intervention.intervention_name: Invega Sustenna 156 MG in 1 ML Prefilled Syringe
